ActWar Veterans Allowance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Veterans Allowance Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the VETERANS ALLOWANCE REGULATIONS in order to ensure equity in the calculation of Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) benefits for both Veterans and other individuals who are eligible for VAC income support and income supplement benefits.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0158 Publication Date: 2013-10-09
